prompt: Send Naveen his weekly email summary. Search emails from the past 7 days: node /workspace/group/gmail.js list --after 7d --max 100. Also run: node /workspace/group/gmail.js stats for overall inbox health. Compile a weekly summary using the Weekly Summary template from /workspace/group/contexts/email-triage.md. Include: total emails received, breakdown by urgency (URGENT/IMPORTANT/ROUTINE), top senders this week, key unresolved threads (important emails without replies), and any VIP list update suggestions (frequent senders Naveen engages with). Send the summary via send_message. Keep it concise but comprehensive.

Send Naveen his morning email digest. Run: node /workspace/group/gmail.js list --unread --after 24h --max 50. For each email, classify it using the triage rules in /workspace/group/contexts/email-triage.md (URGENT/IMPORTANT/ROUTINE). Compose a digest using the Daily Digest template from the triage context â€” group by urgency level, include sender, subject, and time for each. Include a summary of how many routine emails were found. Send the digest via send_message. Then archive routine emails (newsletters, promotions, receipts) using: node /workspace/group/gmail.js archive <messageId>. Update /workspace/group/gmail-state.json with lastDigestSent timestamp. If there are no unread emails, send a brief 'Inbox zero â€” no new emails in the last 24h' message.

Check for urgent new emails. Read /workspace/group/gmail-state.json to get lastCheckedHistoryId. Run: node /workspace/group/gmail.js history --since-id <historyId>. For each new message, read the full email with: node /workspace/group/gmail.js read <messageId>. Classify each email using the triage rules in /workspace/group/contexts/email-triage.md. If any email is URGENT (VIP sender, action-required, legal/financial, direct reply to sent email), send an immediate Telegram alert using send_message with the format from the triage context. Update /workspace/group/gmail-state.json with the new historyId and add notified messageIds to prevent duplicates. Skip any messageId already in notifiedMessageIds. If no urgent emails found, do nothing (no message needed).
last_result: Checked 15 new emails since last history ID 270584870. All emails were classified as ROUTINE (QC approvals, support tickets, call notifications, automated reports) - none met URGENT criteria. Updated
